remarks: The domain of ` recs ` is all ordinals (lemma for transfinite recursion).  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 9-Jul-2019.)
statement:
tfrlemi14d.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlemi14d.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ( Fun F /\ ( F ` x ) e. _V ) ) $.
tfrlemi14d $p |- ( ph -> dom recs ( F ) = On ) $.
$d A f x y $.
$d F f x y $.
$d f ph y $.
